## Prediction from saved xgboost model

```{r}
#saved xgboost model in "model"
load("./data/model.rda")
```

```{r}
prediction <- predict(
      model,
      tibble::tibble("cement" = 275,
             "blast_furnace_slag" = 20,
             "fly_ash" = 0,
             "water" = 185,
             "superplasticizer" = 5,
             "coarse_aggregate" = 975,
             "fine_aggregate" = 775,
             "age" = 28
      )
    )

paste("You chose:", round(prediction$.pred, 1), "MPa")
```
